Sign to Support Amber Heard in Aquaman 2 and her life. She's a United Nations Human Rights Champion, ACLU Women's Rights Ambassador, and humanitarian - also shows more updates and links to evidence: https://www.change.org/p/amber-heard-supporters-we-support-amber-heard-in-aquaman-2

A longer 'documentary' video of strong evidence before the UK case that is going well and the 2nd half of her good work and leadership is at: https://youtu.be/PaR6L5nMGoc

snippet.textDisplay: Thank you so much you for posting! Male victims of abuse all too often are ignored but Johnny Depp is NOT one of them. He is a textbook abuser and it's so sad so many people do not see the truth. I fear he will go on to abuse other women.  I hope that when people look back on this they will be ashamed of how they treated Amber. Her strength is truly inspiring 💜

snippet.textDisplay:
Thanks for supporting Amber Heard! They say Jennifer Grey was also abused by Depp, and they're making 3 documentaries on his abuse, one of which showing other women he abused. It can be seen at TheGeekBuzz.com - They're using a Professional Firm to silence Amber like they did against dozens of actresses by BlackCube. Social Bots were never reported before.
We did a Preliminary Social Network Analysis. It shows 35,000 new accounts used against Amber from 2019-2021 and 134,000 tweets in 2020 just from accounts made the same year ;(

snippet.textDisplay:
The Full Audios are Posted on Incredibly Incredible's channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCjKNc-woAlnxt0H-yJ8RXJg/videos
Full Audio Phone Call (over 30 minutes): https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_DRr6FMZ9Ws
Full Audio Marriage Counseling Session (2 hours): https://youtu.be/5qGVv4SG6z8
There are parts where as shown, it shows that JD's saying they had physical fights and that he did hit her, she didn't work on yelling, also, the part in the call where she said she feared he would 'accidentally' kill her and feared for her life.
Amber Heard is more genuine about her fears and the abuse she faced in the audio she didn't know was being recorded.

snippet.textDisplay:
Amazing to Support Amber Heard!! Please tell organizations (I contacted Ditch the Label again to stop the abuse against her) and post her evidence online, such as on medium, creating petitions to support on change . org, creating videos, etc. Thanks for supporting Amber Heard.
DtL: "Yes, you’re absolutely right in that the abuse needs to be stopped. It is of such a high volume which must be so tough to deal for Ms Heard to deal with. I am hoping that we hear back on the progress of our reports soon. I will contact you when we know more. If you have any questions in the meantime, please do not hesitate to contact us via email."
I really hope one of these reports will actually do something to remove the cyberabuse.
I reported a hate group on reddit which was removed earlier and 4 comments sections on petitions were closed.

I'm worried about her 2nd In-Person trial which is 20 miles from Washington DC, and we see that they refuse to stop hate online or toxicity, which causes violence like we saw in DC this month. The UK is safer than the USA.

snippet.textDisplay: Bottom line is he's an addict.  Addicts lie. To themselves, to others, to the world. They want everyone to believe they are the best person ever because their hiding who they really are. Who get's to see who they really are? The people they live with.  The spouses and children. They are the ones who take on the brunt of the abuse. She was a young girl who got taken advantage of by an older man. He wanted her because he thought he could manipulate and control her and hold her prisoner.  She stood up for herself and left him and told the world what happened to her.  He's outraged and does not want to let go of her.  All these lawsuits are his way of trying to keep some type of control over her.  If he was really done with her, he would just make a public comment, "not true, wish her well, sorry it didn't work out." End of. If he would have done that instead of of all these ridiculous lawsuits, he wouldn't be in the mess he is now.  But no, he has to try to push her down because how dare she leave him and reveal him.

@Rosie Bottom Added more to the updated petition of her evidence "We Support Amber Heard in Aquaman 2, Her Life, and Her Leadership": https://www.change.org/p/we-support-amber-heard-in-aquaman-2-her-life-and-her-leadership
TPTB make it so difficult for any of her support to be heard. Also, I agree with you, except he is far worse than Elvis to threaten Amber's life and to allow many people to be intimidated, just like Manson. Manson and JD can get security guards to work and lie for them. I saw a security co give his card to Manson at Nashville airport in 2018. The fans have to say who they are.
But where is the help for Amber or Evan or these other women? Who will give their cards to them?

Depp continues to be friends with MM despite the evidence from Evan. Depp allows MM to be around hi daughter. Depp allows his 13 year old daughter to smoke weed with him. Gives out the cliched hippy reason that its safer blah blah. Depp admits he started drugs at 12 but fails to make the connection that his daughter may end up like him. He reminds me of Elvis - deluded, spoilt, self entitled, non- empathetic,  self obsessed.

snippet.textDisplay:
@Olinda Torres We support Amber Heard's life and she will win this trial....

In the July 2020 UK NGN trial's exposures showing strong support for Amber Heard, the statements made that she was abused are supported by seen physical injuries and distress of Amber, damaged property, witnessed abuse, and staff being bystanders by not helping her in the witness statements by Josh Drew, Melanie Inglessis, Whitney Henriquez, Kristina Sexton, IO Tillet-Wright, and other witnesses published.

Yet, Amber Heard's side has not been publicly supported online or circulated, crowdfunding is against her, there may be public safety interruptions, and there is endless cyberabuse, threats, and incited hate online daily to cause witnesses, supporters, nonprofits, and businesses to be fearful. We care about her situation and life.

Data collected, audios, visuals, and texts support her if you see it from Amber's perspective without incited hate or altered perceptions that can be deadly. We've tried to interfere and help her online.

https://www.change.org/p/we-support-amber-heard-in-aquaman-2-and-her-life/u/27309579
